00030 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 // Function: NewSystemPage()
00032 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 NewSystemPage::NewSystemPage(LibraryInterface* libInterface, QWidget* parentDlg) : PropertyPageView(),
00034                                                                                    libInterface_(libInterface),
00035                                                                                    compTreeWidget_(0),
00036                                                                                    vlnvEditor_(0),
00037                                                                                    directoryEdit_(0)
00038 {
00039     // Create the title and description labels labels.
00040     QLabel* titleLabel = new QLabel(tr("New System"), this);
00041 
00042     QFont font = titleLabel->font();
00043     font.setPointSize(12);
00044     font.setBold(true);
00045     titleLabel->setFont(font);
00046 
00047     QLabel* descLabel = new QLabel(tr("Creates a system design for an existing component"), this);
00048 
00049     // Retrieve the component sub-tree item.
00050     LibraryItem const* root = libInterface->getTreeRoot();
00051     LibraryItem const* compRoot = 0;
00052 
00053     for (int i = 0; i < root->getNumberOfChildren(); ++i)
00054     {
00055         if (root->child(i)->getName() == VLNV::type2Print(VLNV::COMPONENT))
00056         {
00057             compRoot = root->child(i);
00058             break;
00059         }
00060     }
00061 
00062     // Tree widget label.
00063     QLabel* treeLabel = new QLabel(tr("Select Component:"), this);
00064 
00065     // Create the tree widget and fill it with VLNV data.
00066     compTreeWidget_ = new QTreeWidget(this);
00067     compTreeWidget_->setColumnCount(1);
00068     compTreeWidget_->setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectItems);
00069     compTreeWidget_->header()->close();
00070 
00071     if (compRoot != 0)
00072     {
00073         for (int i = 0; i < compRoot->getNumberOfChildren(); ++i)
00074         {
00075             QTreeWidgetItem* item = new QTreeWidgetItem();
00076             item->setText(0, compRoot->child(i)->getName());
00077 
00078             // Add child items.
00079             addChildItems(compRoot->child(i), item);
00080 
00081             // Add the item to the tree.
00082             compTreeWidget_->addTopLevelItem(item);
00083         }
00084 
00085         compTreeWidget_->sortItems(0, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00086     }
00087 
00088     connect(compTreeWidget_, SIGNAL(currentItemChanged(QTreeWidgetItem*, QTreeWidgetItem*)),
00089             this, SLOT(onTreeItemChanged(QTreeWidgetItem*, QTreeWidgetItem*)));
00090 
00091     // Create the VLNV editor.
00092     vlnvEditor_ = new VLNVEditor(VLNV::COMPONENT, libInterface, parentDlg, this, true);
00093     connect(vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00094     connect(vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SLOT(updateDirectory()));
00095 
00096     // Create the directory line edit and label.
00097     QLabel *directoryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Directory:"), this);
00098  
00099     QSettings settings;
00100     QString defaultDir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00101     directoryEdit_ = new QLineEdit(defaultDir, this);
00102     connect(directoryEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(QString const&)), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00103 
00104     QPushButton* pathButton = new QPushButton("Browse...", this);
00105     connect(pathButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(selectDirectory()));
00106     QHBoxLayout *pathLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00107     pathLayout->addWidget(directoryLabel);
00108     pathLayout->addWidget(directoryEdit_, 1);
00109     pathLayout->addWidget(pathButton);
00110 
00111     // Setup the layout.
00112     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00113     layout->addWidget(titleLabel);
00114     layout->addWidget(descLabel);
00115     layout->addSpacing(12);
00116     layout->addWidget(treeLabel);
00117     layout->addWidget(compTreeWidget_);
00118     layout->addWidget(vlnvEditor_);
00119     layout->addSpacing(12);
00120     layout->addLayout(pathLayout);
00121     layout->addStretch(1);
00122 }

00132 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 // Function: prevalidate()
00134 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00135 bool NewSystemPage::prevalidate() const
00136 {
00137     if (compTreeWidget_->currentItem() == 0)
00138     {
00139         return false;
00140     }
00141 
00142     QVariant data = compTreeWidget_->currentItem()->data(0, Qt::UserRole);
00143 
00144     return (!data.isNull() && data.value<VLNV>().isValid() &&
00145             vlnvEditor_->isValid() && !directoryEdit_->text().isEmpty());
00146 }
00147 
00148 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00149 // Function: validate()
00150 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00151 bool NewSystemPage::validate()
00152 {
00153     Q_ASSERT(prevalidate());
00154 
00155     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00156 
00157     VLNV designVLNV(VLNV::DESIGN, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
00158         vlnv.getName().remove(".comp") + ".design", vlnv.getVersion());
00159     VLNV desConfVLNV(VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
00160         vlnv.getName().remove(".comp") + ".designcfg", vlnv.getVersion());
00161 
00162     // Check if any of the VLNVs already exists.
00163     if (libInterface_->contains(vlnv))
00164     {
00165         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00166             tr("The system cannot be created because the VLNV %1 already exists in the library.").arg(vlnv.toString()),
00167             QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00168         msgBox.exec();
00169         return false;
00170     }
00171 
00172     if (libInterface_->contains(designVLNV))
00173     {
00174         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00175             tr("The system cannot be created because the VLNV %1 already exists in the library.").arg(designVLNV.toString()),
00176             QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00177         msgBox.exec();
00178         return false;
00179     }
00180 
00181     if (libInterface_->contains(desConfVLNV))
00182     {
00183         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00184             tr("The system cannot be created because the VLNV %1 already exists in the library.").arg(desConfVLNV.toString()),
00185             QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00186         msgBox.exec();
00187         return false;
00188     }    
00189 
00190     return true;
00191 }

00193 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00194 // Function: apply()
00195 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00196 void NewSystemPage::apply()
00197 {
00198     Q_ASSERT(compTreeWidget_->currentItem() != 0);
00199     QVariant data = compTreeWidget_->currentItem()->data(0, Qt::UserRole);
00200 
00201     emit createSystem(data.value<VLNV>(), vlnvEditor_->getVLNV(), directoryEdit_->text());
00202 }

00204 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00205 // Function: onPageChange()
00206 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00207 bool NewSystemPage::onPageChange()
00208 {
00209     // Discard the VLNV and collapse the tree widget.
00210     vlnvEditor_->setVLNV(VLNV());
00211     compTreeWidget_->collapseAll();
00212     compTreeWidget_->setCurrentItem(0);
00213     return true;
00214 }

00216 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00217 // Function: selectDirectory()
00218 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00219 void NewSystemPage::selectDirectory()
00220 {
00221     QString dir = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Select Directory"),
00222                                                     directoryEdit_->text());
00223 
00224     if (!dir.isEmpty())
00225     {
00226         directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00227     }
00228 }

00230 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00231 // Function: onTreeItemChanged()
00232 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00233 void NewSystemPage::onTreeItemChanged(QTreeWidgetItem* cur, QTreeWidgetItem*)
00234 {
00235     if (cur != 0)
00236     {
00237         // Check if the item has a VLNV (i.e. is a leaf item).
00238         QVariant data = cur->data(0, Qt::UserRole);
00239         
00240         if (!data.isNull())
00241         {
00242             VLNV compVLNV = data.value<VLNV>();
00243             VLNV sysVLNV = vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00244 
00245             // Auto-fill the VLNV editor information (vendor and library fields).
00246             vlnvEditor_->setVLNV(VLNV(VLNV::DESIGN, compVLNV.getVendor(), compVLNV.getLibrary(),
00247                                       sysVLNV.getName(), sysVLNV.getVersion()));                            
00248         }
00249     }
00250 
00251     emit contentChanged();
00252 }
00253 
00254 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00255 // Function: addChildItems()
00256 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00257 void NewSystemPage::addChildItems(LibraryItem const* libItem, QTreeWidgetItem* treeItem)
00258 {
00259     for (int i = 0; i < libItem->getNumberOfChildren(); ++i)
00260     {
00261         // Create a child tree widget item.
00262         QTreeWidgetItem* item = new QTreeWidgetItem();
00263         item->setText(0, libItem->child(i)->getName());
00264 
00265         VLNV* vlnv = libItem->child(i)->getVLNV();
00266 
00267         // Recursively add its children if this is not the leaf level.
00268         if (vlnv == 0)
00269         {
00270             addChildItems(libItem->child(i), item);
00271         }
00272         else
00273         {
00274             // Add the VLNV to the item's data.
00275             item->setData(0, Qt::UserRole, QVariant::fromValue((*vlnv)));
00276         }
00277 
00278         // Add the item as a child of the given tree item.
00279         treeItem->addChild(item);
00280     }
00281 }
00282 
00283 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00284 // Function: updateDirectory()
00285 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00286 void NewSystemPage::updateDirectory()
00287 {
00288     QSettings settings;
00289     QString dir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00290 
00291     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00292 
00293     if (!vlnv.getVendor().isEmpty())
00294     {
00295         dir += "/" + vlnv.getVendor();
00296 
00297         if (!vlnv.getLibrary().isEmpty())
00298         {
00299             dir += "/" + vlnv.getLibrary();
00300 
00301             if (!vlnv.getName().isEmpty())
00302             {
00303                 dir += "/" + vlnv.getName();
00304 
00305                 if (!vlnv.getVersion().isEmpty())
00306                 {
00307                     dir += "/" + vlnv.getVersion();
00308                 }
00309             }
00310         }
00311     }
00312 
00313     directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00314 }
